name: PaperNinja
description:
PAPERNINJA

  • A Dungeon like randomisied game with multiple options to play it
  • for now 7  enemies
  • for now  26 items to collect
  • for now 3 complete Areas to explore
  • for now 1 bossfight

CONTROLS

  • Throw Weapon - STRG/Left Mouse Button
  • Bring Back Weapon - Space/Right Mouse Button
  • Go Up  - W
  • Go Left - A
  • Go Right – D
  • Go  Down - S
  • Use Item - E
  • Fullscreen - F4

ITEMGUIDE

CASUAL ITEMS (on the E slot)

  • Red Potion - 2x Damage 
  • Blue Potion - Speeds up your knifes speed
  • Purple Potion -  Enlarges your sword
  • Clock - Slowmo
  • Bomb - Throws a bomb
  • Medkit - Heals one heart

RARE ITEMS

  • Speedboots - Faster movement
  • Moon - Faster mana regeneration
  • Blue Medallion - Speeds up  your knife
  • Eye - Ghosts are visible
  • Kings skull - Ressurecution
  • Boxing glove - 2x Damage
  • Tornado - Spins your weapon
  • Shield - Recover a heart
  • Iceheart - Immune to ice
  • Ant - Changes  height and movementspeed
  • Ankle cuff - Slows and  enlarges your sword
  • Tiny Sword -   Speeds up  and  zoom out your sword
  • Hourseshoe - Upgrades normal chest

WEAPONS

  • Sword -  Normal Speed
  • Sai -  0.1x Faster
  • Bamboo Stick - 0.2x Slower but bigger hitbox
  • Katana - 0.5x Slower but bigger hitbox
  • Small Katana - 0.25x Faster
  • Shuriken - 0.1x Faster
  • Scythe - 0.2x Slower but bigger hitbox
  • Battlehammer - 0.25x slower but bigger hitbox
  • Kunai - 0.25x Faster

FLAMES

  • Red Flame - 2x Damage 
  • Blue Flame- Speeds up your knifes speed
  • Purple Flame -  Enlarges your sword

UPCOMMING 

  • Music
  • Sounds
  • Bug Fixes(Mage Hearts)
  • More Areas
  • More Items
  • More Weapons
